title: The Otherside
brief: Puzzle game combining word solving, chase mechanics, and maze exploration. Game and level design lead.

subtitles.title: Project Description
subtitles.content: The Otherside is a actively in development puzzle game that combines word puzzle solving, chasing, and mazeexploration. The player play as a firefly who has lost their memmory and got spawned onto this strange maze with spiders chasing them around. They have to collect scattered characters in the maze to retrive their memory and find their way out of the maze. Itch.io page at https://ollieii.itch.io/the-other-side

subtitles.title: My Responsibility
subtitles.content:
Designed, iterated the game's mechanics and levels, ensuring a balanced and engaging player experience. 
Collaborated with the artist and programmer to create a cohesive and immersive atmosphere. 
Managed the team and the project timeline, ensuring that milestones were met and the project stayed on track. 
Conducted playtesting sessions to gather feedback and make necessary adjustments to the game design.

subtitles.title: Tech Stack
subtitles.content: Unity, C#, Game Design, Level Design, Project Management
